content: what's the rustc_save_analysis crate for/do? There's no crate docs and rustc-dev_guide doesnt mention it :laughing:
It generates JSON files with various bits of data, used by RLS as input to then produce LSP responses. I believe it's all unstable but not sure on the details.
There are also some third party tools using it like https://github.com/est31/warnalyzer
